posts.title: Baby Hammock
posts.content: Teach your tiny human the finer points of relaxation from an early age with this baby hammock. Weighing just 7.5 pounds, this pint-size natural cotton hammock sways gently to lull your baby to sleep while keeping them safe and comfortable.

posts.title: Chemistry Shot Glasses
posts.content: “Stand back – I’m about to perform science!” is what you’ll be screaming to others as you go to work creating sensational drinks with the chemistry shot glasses. Shaped like common chemistry beakers, they’re ideal for accurately concocting the perfect drink.

posts.title: Pizza Beanbag
posts.content: Discover a whole new meaning to “comfort food” when you experience the utter bliss of sitting in a pizza beanbag. This ultra comfy slice of heavenly pie comes topped off with a generous serving of cheese and pepperoni that’ll make your mouth water.

posts.title: Anti-Wrinkle Face Slimming Mouthpiece
posts.content: Help maintain a youthful appearance by giving yourself a daily lift using this anti-wrinkle face slimming mouthpiece. Simply pop the mold in and begin making  a series of disturbing mouth movements for 3 minutes to start strengthening your facial expression muscles.

posts.title: Credit Card Sized Survival Tool
posts.content: Store a backpack’s worth of useful tools in your back pocket by slipping this credit card sized survival tool into your wallet. Crafted from stainless steel, it comes packed with 14 useful tools such as a bottle opener, a nail pry, a hex wrench, and a handy saw.

posts.title: GoPro Hero 4 Session Camera
posts.content: GoPro just announced its new Hero4 Session camera – and it’s the smallest model they’ve ever developed. It’s only 1.5 inches long on each side, can shoot 1080p at 60 frames per second, and is waterproof up to 10 meters without needing a case!

posts.title: Basketball Arcade Game
posts.content: Bring the fun of the arcade straight into your living room with the basketball arcade game. Featuring 2 heavy duty pro-style rims and 7 basketballs, you can play til your hearts content or go head to head against a worthy foe until one emerges victorious.

posts.title: One Handed Jar Opener
posts.content: Open virtually any jar or twist-off with minimal effort using this one handed jar opener. This handy device comes with a row of small stainless steel teeth that will firmly grip to any jar lid so that you can conveniently open them up with a simple twist of your hand.

posts.title: Microchip Pet Feeder
posts.content: Ensure that only the intended pet gets to eat his food using this clever microchip pet feeder. It helps keep food fresh and ensures that only the designated pet can access the food within – making it a must-have for animals on specialized diets.

posts.title: Compact Food Preparation Set
posts.content: Help meal preparation go off without a hitch with help from this compact food preparation set. Each bowl in the set comes with wide handles for easy gripping and is designed to fit within one another like a Russian nesting doll to save on space.

posts.title: The Simultaneous Wet-Dry Vacuum
posts.content: Cut down your weekly chore time by cleaning floors more efficiently than ever with the CrossWave wet-dry vacuum. This dual-purpose appliance allows you to simultaneously vacuum and wash your hardwood floors, rugs, or carpets.

posts.title: Slow Feed Dog Bowl
posts.content: Avoid canine obesity by promoting healthy eating habits for your pup using this slow feed dog bowl. Made from food-safe ABS plastic, the bowl features a series of ridges designed to extend the time it takes for your hungry pooch to devour his food.
